meanings.definition: A person who hates or is averse to marriage.
meanings.sent1: Some people are misogynists because they do not like the idea of marriage.
meanings.sent2: The misogynists in the group always avoided discussions about weddings.
meanings.sent3: The sitcom character comically portrayed a misogynist who ran away from every wedding invitation.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the town was filled with misogynists who believed marriage was a trap.
meanings.sent5: The movie depicted a group of misogynists who formed a club against marriage.
